author: PTI
title: WHO welcomes joint efforts with India to fight COVID-19
description: The world health body wants to leverage the strategies that helped the country eradicate polio to fight the pandemic
content: The World Health Organization (WHO) chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus has welcomed the world health bodys cooperation with India to leverage strategies that helped the country win its war against polio into the response to COVID-19 outbreak, saying such joint … [+3650 chars]
